name: Physiotherapy
description: Physiotherapy helps to restore movement and function when someone is affected by injury, illness or disability.

name: DNA testing
description: Genetic testing can reveal changes (mutations) in your genes that may cause illness or disease.

name: Vaccination
description: Vaccination is a simple, safe, and effective way of protecting people against harmful diseases, before they come into contact with them.

name: PCR testing
description: PCR test involves ... The test involves taking a swab of the inside of your nose and the back of your throat, using a long cotton bud.

name: Ultrasonography
description: Ultrasonography helps you to monitor an unborn baby in the womb and make sure it is developing normally.

name: Blood Test
description: A blood test usually involves taking a blood sample from a blood vessel in your arm
